question:
You are planning a holiday and want to find out about the kinds of holiday packages that can be arranged by a local company.


Write a letter to the company to ask for information about the holiday packages they offer. In your letter:


say where and when you would like to go
include details about the kind of holiday you would like to take
say what kind of information you would like to receive
text: I am writing this letter to enquire about holiday packages that are available from your company. I was suggested your company by one of my friends who had a pleasant experience.

I am planning  a trip to visit Europe in the next two months. I will be taking leave for a month and I would like to explore the scenic beauty and the historical places in Europe. I am looking for a package that includes travel, food, attractions and an official tour guide.

Could you please share all the relevant packages that match my criteria? In addition to that, could you please share the brochure that includes trip cost, hotel for stay, the food options and places that are included in the visit and the mode of travel  to different cities within Europe so that I can opt for the best one?
Looking forward to hearing from you.
